remarks: Lemma for ~ 4sq .  Use the pigeonhole principle to show that the sets ` { m ^ 2 | m e. ( 0 ... N ) } ` and ` { -u 1 - n ^ 2 | n e. ( 0 ... N ) } ` have a common element, ` mod P ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Jul-2014.)
